[site]: crossvalidated
[post_id]: 291384
[parent_id]: 
[tags]: 
Which model to considerate to analyse the impact of 4 predictor variables on a time series?

I would like to build a model to identify the impact (x) of: Price [double] Discount [y/n] (if Price differs from the baseline price) Number of Updates [integer] Type of Update [3 to 4 categories] on (y): Number of Users [Integer] the data are collected over several years on weekly basis as a time series. I would like to know which models I should use to analyze the effects of x on y. I am unsure about the applicability of simple regression models due to the time component. Is it reasonable to use a regression? Are there other models to take into account (for example is it possible to use a ARMA model although forecasting data is not necessary)? I can also provide a acf and pacf chart of the "#users": Sample of one series: date max_players price discount feature_update non_feature_update bugfix 2016-08-25 39039 29,99 0 0 0 0 2016-08-26 37923
